name: Vintage sun
description: Neo-vintage series 1 available All my products are carefully handmade, with materials of the best quality. Each pouch is unique, involving no mass production or industrial goods. All tobacco pouches are available with a zipper pocket for storing rolling papers, filters and lighter. You simply insert the tobacco and seal the bag with a beautiful cord strap. This Tobacco Pouch is a perfect birthday or christmas present. Each pouch is a unique item! The color of the pouch can vary depending on your own screen display. Dimensions Each pouch measures when fully opened: 21 x 16 cm Materials Both the front and lining fabric are 100% Cotton (Melissa Averinos). *I recommend to wash at: Machine Wash 30° C Hand Wash Warm *Custom orders are also available. *For wholesale order please email me for more info [apotospitimou[at]gmail[dot]com]. If you have any questions just write me a message!
